name: Optical Character Recognition
description: Convert printed or handwritten text within images into digital, machine-readable text for further processing.
usecase: Used in document digitization, text extraction from images, and automatic license plate recognition.
challenges: Challenges include handling various fonts, sizes, and styles of text, as well as noise and distortion.
popular_methods: Common methods include traditional OCR algorithms (e.g., Tesseract), deep learning-based approaches (e.g., CRNN), and ensemble methods.
